It’s pretty obvious that this was a returned shirt that someone didn’t want and was purchased as new from me.']}, 'Nike Youth Park VII Short Sleeve Jersey, BV6742-010': {'price': 28.97, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P033', 'rating': 4.5, 'reviews': ['Great quality shirts! I will say the shirt is different than the Nike pro dri fit shirts but still a great shirt my son loves it.', 'My teen is pretty picky with the shorts he wears. The size was perfect. The soft gray color and quality fabric are a nice addition to the shirts he will wear. I bought it for the value for the money and the bonus was the breathabilty of the shirt. He asked me what other colors he could get it in next.']}}
